39332802.review:
[h1]На себе ношу я дом, от зверей я прячусь в нем.[/h1]

[i]Очаровательный и добрый детский [b]платформер[/b], повествующий о большом увлекательном странствии одной милой и жизнерадостной улитки по имени Боб. 
Путешествие Боба задалось на славу - сначала игроки знакомятся с персонажем в его роскошных и красочных пенатах, затем они вместе с ним поочередно отправляются в солнечный лес, фэнтезийную сказку, на коралловый остров и, наконец, в гости к Санте. За вычетом славного и доходчивого туториала мы получаем ровно [b]150[/b] занятных уровней-головоломок, приправленных разнообразными мини-играми вроде поиска звездочек или собирания мозаики.
[b]Управление[/b] в [b]Snail Bob 2: Tiny Troubles[/b] устроено по принципу кликера. [b]Интерфейс[/b] на уровнях содержит всего лишь 3 кнопки - паузу, перезапуск и горизонтальный поворот персонажа. Собственно, весь [b]игровой процесс[/b] сосредоточен на взаимодействии игрока с интерактивной средой, содержащей константы (раковину Боба и звездочки) и переменные (условия, необходимые для прохождения определенных уровней). По достижении определенного количества звезд Вы разблокируете тот или иной вариант внешнего облика Боба, который всегда можно сменить в окне гардероба.
Особой вишенкой на торте является самобытная и живописная двумерная [b]графика[/b], стилизованная под мультфильмы студии «Мельница». Маленькие детки будут в восторге от сочных красок, ярких образов и потрясающе проработанных задних планов. 
А дополняет всё это великолепие упоительное [b]музыкальное сопровождение[/b], состоящее из тамбурина и акустической гитары, и погружающее нас без остатка в теплую и уютную сказочную [b]атмосферу[/b].
И напоследок стоит упомянуть о том, что в [b]Snail Bob 2: Tiny Troubles[/b] имеется просто запредельное количество пасхалок и остроумных отсылок к различным явлениям и произведениям культуры.
А еще Вы найдете здесь карточки, несложные достижения и наличие русскоязычной локализации. И, ежели Вам сильно понравился данный шедевр, то имейте в виду, что у отечественной компании-разработчика [url=http://store.steampowered.com/search/?developer=Hunter%20Hamster]Hunter Hamster[/url] имеются в репертуаре другие игры из данной серии, которые можно найти на различных сторонних сайтах.

[b]Вердикт:[/b] Светлый и добрый жизнерадостный пазл-платформер, который придется по вкусу любому ребенку. Я однозначно рекомендую его к приобретению тем родителям, у которых есть детки в возрасте от 5 до 13 лет. Также имейте в виду, что возрастной рейтинг [b]E[/b] ("Для всех") довольно условный, так как в игре имеются страшненькие кракозябры и в меру суровые смерти главного персонажа.

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/alina_nomie/recommended/574580]➤ Ссылочка на предыдущий обзор ❣[/url]

А ежели Вам понравились данные обзоры, то смело подписывайтесь на мое курирование игр на соответствующей [url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/30845640]странице[/url] в Steam Store. Также вступайте в [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/nomie]группу ♥ Nomie Games ♥[/url], полностью посвященную моим игровым обзорам.[/i]

[i] [b]Childish, but quite relaxing.
8 out of 10 Snail Bobs.[/b]

37985201.review:
[b] What Is This Game About [/b]
You play as a snail named bob and you have to go though different levels in the game and try to get past everything that is trying to kill the poor snail.

[b] GamePlay + level design [/b]
The gameplay for this game is fun and easy to learn. As its quite simple as all you have to do is click. The level design for this game is very good as each level is a bit different from the last. The game is a bit easy but as you progress though the levels some levels can become a challenge and may take you some time to complete. Overall the devs did a really good job on the levels in this game not one level is the same as the last and each one is just as fun as the last.

[b] Controls [/b]
The controls for this game are very easy to learn as you just click which way you would like to go so anyone can play this game. The controls are simple and i think that makes the game more fun as won't just die just becasue the controls were not working. Am just to say that the game runs great and it has no problems from the player dieing from something that was not their fault.

[b] Artwork [/b]
The artwork is in a cartoon style which looks good for the game. The cloths you can get for snail bob look great also as they all look good and all fit in into the game. This game also looks good as a 2d game which a lot of games i have played that are 2d and use this type of art style fail but snail bob does it well.

[b] Story [/b]
The story for this game is quite short as you get a little cut scene that shows what happened to bob and it just shows why he is trapped in a forest([spoiler] a bird yeeted him [/spoiler]) This game will also take you a while to fully complete this game as it does have a lots of levels to finish. As the story is just a little one its not what the game devs tried to fully get right as this game is more based on the level design.

[b] Overall [/b]
This game is surprisingly a really fun game and is worth getting sadly its the only snail bob game on steam i would like to see more snail bob games in the future. i played this game as a child and am happy to be playing it now on steam

[b] Thanks HellCow [/b]
[quote] This review was submitted for [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/gaming_until_end]Gaming Until End[/url], through the generous contribution of [url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/HellCowON]HellCow.[/url] [/quote]

It seems they update this game with some fair regularity, as the guide doesn't even mention the fourth area. Enjoy the game!

Podczas swej podróży nasz ślimaczek spotyka różne niebezpieczeństwa, okropne żaby które czekają tylko aż powinie nam się ślimacza " nóżka " robaki które ostrzą zęby na smakowitego boba oraz wiele innych !

29223246.review: Dobrze nam znana gra o ślimaku, który za zadanie ma dotrzeć do wyjścia. Gra jest trochę logiczna, trochę na spostrzegawczość, trochę na zręczność. W tej grze są dostępne 3 części, które są również dostępne w internecie na przeglądarkę. Wystarczy wpisać w google. Odziwo 4 część na steam miała wyjść w grudniu 2015r., a nie wyszła. Fajna, miła sympatyczna gra, przede wszystkim łatwa do przejścia. Wersja steamowa o tyle mi się podoba, bo są osiągnięcia. Moje ocena oczywiście nie inna jak 10/10.

29062088.review:
[h1] Information [/h1]

Snail Bob 2 ist ein Puzzle/Denk-Spiel, welches von  Hunter Hamster entwickelt wurde.

[h1] Gameplay [/h1]

Bob ist eine Schnecke, die deine Hilfe braucht, um gefährliche Hindernisse zu überwinden und Bösewichten  auszuweichen und diese zu vermeiden. Als Bob kriechst du die meiste Zeit durch Abschnitte und du löst dabei Rätsel, um die Ausgangstür zu erreichen.  Deine Aufgabe ist es Knöpfe zu drücken, Maschinen zu aktivieren, Gegnern auszuweichen und tödliche Fallen zu umgehen. In jedem Level gilt es 3 Sterne zu sammeln und evt. ein Puzzleteil, welches wiederum am Ende Bonuslevel freischaltet, wenn man alle gesammelt hat.

[h1] Pro [/h1]

+ für Kinder geeignet
+ 3 Welten mit jeweils 25 Level
+ Sammelbare Gegenstände
+ Kostüme um Bob anzupassen
+ schöner Grafikstil 
+ passender Sound
+ Bonuslevel
+ keine Bugs
+ Trading Cards + Errungenschaften

[h1] Kontra [/h1]

- Level sind zu leicht
- Welt 4 sollte 2015 erscheinen, bisher war dies nicht der Fall

[h1] Fazit [/h1]

Snail Bob 2 ist das perfekte Spiel für Eltern, um mit ihren Kindern zusammen gemeinsam Lösungen zu finden, um die verschiedene Level zu meistern und Spaß zu haben. Klare Kaufempfehlung.

28481599.review:
Un jeu tout mignon, haut en couleurs, destiné aux enfants mais finalement il a su amuser aussi le grand enfant que je suis lool. Un gameplay vraiment amusant, les succès sont faciles à obtenir et agréables à faire. 

Une combinaison de puzzles faciles à réaliser, plein de jolies couleurs attrayantes, un petit escargot attachant que l'on peu habiller de différentes façons, une bonne touche d'humour et de fun.

Un bon petit moment de détente et un petit feed back en enfance. En conclusion un peu de gaité et de calme dans ce monde de brutes, ça change.

[i]Улитка Боб, скажи, где домик твой?
С крыльцом высоким и печной трубой?
Улитка Боб ответил, помолчав:
Свой домик я таскаю на плечах.
Не то чтоб он тяжел или велик...
Проблема в том, что он ко мне прилип.[/i]

Очень яркая, красочная, приятная во всех смыслах игра. Отличное развлечение для совместного прохождения с детьми - начиная от дошкольного возраста и заканчивая бородатыми битардами. Сам уже час залипаю, ибо игра хоть и детская, но обладает кучей отсылок к фильмам и играм современности. Тут вам и Звездные войны, и Марио, и Робин Гуд, и Солид Снэйк - заметите ровно столько, насколько хватит внимания.

22540933.review:
Snail Bob 2: Tiny troubles
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Well, I have met a number of snails in my life. Plenty of Jean, Julien, Andre and Paolo (yes, Paolo is a well-known name in the snail community) - but Bob. . .  that is surely the first one I have ever met!   

Snail Bob 2 is a casual puzzle game for parents to play with their kids, but also enjoyable for all ages. At first, you will meet Bob and go through a small tutorial which will show you how make Bob turn around, move and stop, as well as what you will have to look for within the level, such as buttons to press, levers to activate and other things to look for in the level. 

Bob will have 3 stories to play in this game and each of them has 30 levels to complete. Basically, you will have to get Pao.., sorry Bob to the door with the exist sign in one piece. In each level, you will have to collect three Stars which are very well hidden or blend in within the artwork. Some levels will have a puzzle piece to collect; in total you will have to gather twelves pieces to achieve the entire puzzle. Each time you collect a certain number of stars, you will be given a new outfit in your wardrobe. Bob could become a pirate, a plumber, a Viking snail and much more! 

The path to the exit door is not difficult but you will have several obstacles to navigate in each level. Time of play is approximately thirty-five minutes per story.

Positives:
~~~~~~~   

-	Cute artwork
-	90 levels to complete
-	Great to play with kids
-	Trading Cards & Achievements

Negatives:
~~~~~~~~ 

-	Short game
-	Repetitive

Snail Bob 2 is a casual game for parents and kids to play together.

6.5/10

Key provided by developer/publisher for review purposes. Any opinions expressed are entirely my own!

21306476.review:
Замечательная и очень добрая игра!
Ощущается, что каждый уровень тщательно проработан, сделан вручную и с душой.
Что еще нужно, чтоб провести с удовольствием пару часов?

Если у вас есть дети - они будут в восторге. Если у вас есть взрослые, им тоже обязательно понравится :)
После суровых и брутальных игр я просто ощутил, что отдыхаю морально. Серьезно. 
Очень приятный опыт.
Порадовали уникальные анимации для различных игровых ситуаций. Видно, что для автора это не просто клепание игр ради денег, а нечто гораздо большее. 
Отдельно отмечу звезды на уровнях. Играя, внезапно осознал, что  воспринял их нахождение как вызов и очень хочется вернуться на предыдущие уровни, где нашел не все :)

Рекомендую игру всем и каждому независимо от пола, возраста и любых других параметров.
Мне вот почти тридцать и я бородат, но получил истинное удовольствие от игры, чего и вам желаю!

19237070.review:
[b]As the Spanish translator of the game, today I decided to try it out and then review it.[/b]

[h1]Plot and Levels[/h1]
The game contains various stories which don't have much plot: they just have an introduction to present you the new area, and an ending in which Bob leaves it.
Every area consists of 25 levels, and each one has 3 stars to collect, while some of them have "puzzle pieces" to collect aswell. Getting a specific number of stars unlocks new costumes, and when you get enough pieces to complete the puzzle, you unlock 5 extra levels related to the area you're playing at.
The game has some cool mechanics (which I didn't expect) and even 2 boss battles.

[h1]Difficulty[/h1]
The game is focused to be played by kids so it's not difficult at all. You may fail some times because of stupid actions but you don't really have to think much to complete the game. Boss battles are easy, too.
The only thing that resulted me a bit harder to do was to find every star. I'm not sure if it's because colors distract me more than they do to other people, but there are hidden stars in the background and I couldn't find them easily because of their color. The same happened with some puzzle pieces.

[h1]Music[/h1]
There is a specific tune for each area. Although they're looped, they aren't annoying due to their "softness" and "harmony" (I don't know how to explain it).
The music is as simple as the game so it fits great.

[h1]Cultural References[/h1]
It's the aspect I liked the most of the game. There are backgrounds, clickable items, themes, costumes... which refer to shows and movies (LOST, Star Wars, Spongebob...), videogames (Half Life, Fallout, Metal Gear Solid, Super Mario, Mortal Kombat...) and books (Robin Hood?).

[h1]Rating[/h1]
I think that the game is a 7'5/10 even being focused to children, 'cause it can result fun and entertaining for everyone, and these cultural references improve the game even more. I just dislike that some mechanics become a bit repetitive, and the game's length being too short: I completed (100%'d) the game in just 2 hours. I would love to play more levels!

18278654.review:
A surprisingly charming game.  The comparisons to Lemmings are fairly spot on, though you simply have more direct control over a single 'lemming', aka the titular Snail Bob.  

Each level tasks you with guiding Bob to the goal with numerous types of mini-puzzle objectives along the way to create a safe path.  All levels are single-screen, but can become fairly complex as you progress through the game.  I haven't found the game to become particularly difficult, but some stages require extra thought.  It fits in a niche of being engaging enough for adults but accessible enough for younger children.  

In addition to the goal of guiding Bob, each level has 3 hidden stars as well as occasional puzzle pieces.  Collecting enough of these unlocks costumes for Bob or additional levels (in the case of the puzzle pieces).  Progress is never gated by them however, so there's no pressure to fully scour every level if you don't want to.  Since you can tell Bob to stop at any time, you can easily 'pause' him in a safe place while you hunt for hidden objects, giving a more relaxing feel to the searching.

The game currently consists of 90 levels with more slated to be added at a later date.  There's certainly a 'mobile game' feel to the structure and aesthetic, but the game plays perfectly well on PC.  It won't win any awards for technical achievement, but it succeeds in the goal of being a family friendly puzzle game for all ages.

18202488.review:
Cute little Lemmings-like game. The art/music/sound were very well done, and there was a lot of humor in some of the levels/situations that was amusing.

The levels are extremely easy to solve -- the difficulty level would be appropriate for a 10 or 11 year old though (my 12yo isn't into these kinds of games, but was happy to sit next to me and offer possible solutions).

The one thing I did not like about the game was the star/puzzle piece mechanic. On each level are 3 stars and occasionally a puzzle piece hidden somewhere that the player has to find (technically, you could ignore this, but you need the stars to unlock outfits and the puzzle pieces to, well, solve the puzzle).

The problem is that for almost all of the levels, the stars/puzzle pieces are designed so that they blend into the background so this part of the game becomes "methodically search in a vertical pattern for anomalous objects."

On a few of the levels, the puzzle pieces/stars are hidden behind objects that you have to activate, which made a lot more sense and felt like it was actually part of the game. The "find the hidden object" portion felt divorced from the rest of the gameplay.

All-in-all, though, totally worth it for $5 if you like these kind of games and don't mind the low difficulty level.

18192003.review:
Snail Bob 2 is a fun, casual puzzle game with a few chuckles thrown in.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qDHxD2TSAog
The game tasks you with a very simple objective. Get Snail Bob to the exit, safely.
He will constantly move through the level, so you need to interact with the environment by shifting platform positions, scaring enemies away, etc. You can also click on him to make him stay in one spot, which is useful if you need time to set up something, or keep him on a moving platform. Your second ability is to turn him around.

With those simple mechanics, you're ready to play the entire game. Although it's very simple, the game can still make for some decently challenging and fun puzzles. It never gets insanely difficult, as it's meant to stay a decently casual and relaxing experience. You can collect hidden stars throughout the game, and use them to unlock costumes for Bob. Some levels also have a hidden puzzle piece, that once all have been collected in a chapter, will unlock a few bonus levels.

The game is very simple, yet entertaining. It's got a few pop culture references and jokes every now and again, and the cutscenes are cute, and will make you laugh.

Overall, a charming and fun game!

18179825.review:
Snail [strike]Gary[/strike] Bob 2 takes much inspiration from the lemmings series. Simple objective, direct him toward to exit while collecting hidden coins and puzzle pieces.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BJmi4jWrzbc
Controls are all mouse driven, click on platforms to move them, buttons to use them while directing Bob backward and forward dodging hazards. Screen resolutions of 4k were supported, toggles not sliders for sound. Three worlds were available with a fourth coming in December. Each contained 25 levels and collecting all puzzle pieces rewards an extra 5. Coins collected could be spent on a range of costumes, most drawing reference to gaming and pop culture (Half Life 3!). Collectables were often quite well hidden, which plays like a HoG side-quest.

More aimed at the younger generation it's still enjoyable for older gamers, just quite short lived for the price. If in column B perhaps wait out a sale or coupon and you shouldn't leave disappointed. Cheers.
